Update an item with version check

update_item_version.Rd

Update an item while ensuring no conflicts with other changes. If the item has been modified since the specified version, the update will fail.

Usage

update_item_version(client, item_key, data, version)

Arguments

client

Zotero API client object

item_key

Item key to update

data

New item data

version

Current version of the item

Value

Updated item data

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Update an item
result <- update_item_version(client, 
                             item_key = "ITEM_KEY",
                             data = list(title = "New Title"),
                             version = 123)
} # }
